Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46219 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.29.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-46219 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.29.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.29.6-1, affected by CVE-2023-46219
